Unnamed: 3: As a user, I want to securely register and log in so that my financial data remains protected.
Unnamed: 6:
1. User can register using a valid email and password.
	2. User can log in using registered credentials.
	3. Password reset functionality is available and works correctly.
Unnamed: 7: Implement secure user registration and login functionality. Apply password hashing and session management. Provide password reset functionality with secure token validation.
Unnamed: 8: Authentication and authorization operations shall complete within 2 seconds. User credentials shall be securely stored using encryption and hashing techniques.

Unnamed: 3: As a user, I want to manage my profile details so that my financial assessment is personalized.
Unnamed: 6:
1. User can view and update profile details.
	2. Profile changes are saved successfully.
Unnamed: 7: Allow users to create, view, and update profile details. Store profile information securely and associate it with the authenticated user account.
Unnamed: 8: Profile data updates shall be processed within 2 seconds. User profile information shall be stored securely and accessed only by authorized users.

Unnamed: 3: As a user, I want to enter my income and expenses so that my financial health can be evaluated.
Unnamed: 6:
1. User can enter income and expense details.
	2. Input values are validated before submission.
	3. Financial data is stored correctly.
Unnamed: 7: Develop input forms to collect income, expenses, savings, and EMI details. Validate inputs before submission and store financial data securely in the database.
Unnamed: 8: Input validation and storage shall occur within 1 second of submission. Financial data shall be stored securely to prevent unauthorized access.

Unnamed: 3: As a system, I want to preprocess financial data so that it can be used for ML analysis.
Unnamed: 6:
1. Missing values in financial data are handled.
	2. Financial data is normalized and prepared for ML processing.
Unnamed: 7: Implement data cleaning and preprocessing pipeline. Handle missing values, normalize financial inputs, and generate derived features required for ML processing.
Unnamed: 8: Data preprocessing operations shall complete within 3 seconds per request. The system shall handle invalid or missing data without failure.

Unnamed: 3: As a user, I want to receive a financial health score so that I understand my financial condition.
Unnamed: 6:
1. ML model generates a financial health score.
	2. Score is displayed correctly to the user.
Unnamed: 7: Train and deploy a machine learning regression model to evaluate financial data and generate a financial health score based on user inputs.
Unnamed: 8: ML model prediction latency shall be less than 2 seconds. The system shall ensure consistent scoring for identical inputs.

Unnamed: 3: As a user, I want my score categorized so that I can easily interpret my financial status.
Unnamed: 6:
1. Financial health score is mapped to the correct category.
	2. Category label is displayed accurately.
Unnamed: 7: Implement rule-based logic to classify the financial health score into predefined categories and display the corresponding category to the user.
Unnamed: 8: Score categorization shall be completed within 1 second. Category mapping logic shall be reliable and error-free.

Unnamed: 3: As a user, I want to analyze my spending patterns so that I can identify major expense areas.
Unnamed: 6:
1. Category-wise spending breakdown is displayed.
	2. Visual charts accurately reflect financial data.
Unnamed: 7: Generate category-wise spending analysis and visualizations to help users understand expense distribution and spending behavior.
Unnamed: 8: Analytical charts and visualizations shall load within 3 seconds. Data displayed shall be accurate and up-to-date.

Unnamed: 3: As a user, I want to be alerted about abnormal financial behavior so that I can take corrective action.
Unnamed: 6:
1. Sudden or abnormal spending patterns are detected.
	2. User is notified about detected anomalies.
Unnamed: 7: Implement rule-based anomaly detection to identify abnormal spending patterns and flag potential financial risks.
Unnamed: 8: Anomalies shall be detected in near real-time. Alerts shall be generated immediately after detection.

Unnamed: 3: As a user, I want personalized financial guidance so that I can improve my financial health.
Unnamed: 6:
1. System identifies weak financial areas.
	2. Actionable financial guidance is generated for the user.
Unnamed: 7: Develop a rule-based guidance engine that analyzes financial behavior and provides personalized recommendations for improvement.
Unnamed: 8: Personalized guidance shall be generated within 2 seconds. Recommendations shall remain consistent for similar financial patterns.

Unnamed: 3: As a user, I want to simulate financial changes so that I can see their impact on my financial health.
Unnamed: 6:
1. User can modify financial inputs.
	2. Updated financial health score is recalculated and displayed.
Unnamed: 7: Allow users to modify financial inputs and re-evaluate financial health dynamically to visualize the impact of potential decisions.
Unnamed: 8: Simulation results shall be displayed within 3 seconds. The system shall handle multiple simulation requests without performance degradation.

Unnamed: 3: As a user, I want safe investment suggestions so that I can plan financially without risk.
Unnamed: 6:
1. Investment suggestions are generated based on user category.
	2. Suggested options are appropriate for user risk level.
Unnamed: 7: Provide safe, rule-based investment suggestions based on financial category and risk level without performing stock price or return prediction.
Unnamed: 8: Investment suggestions shall load within 2 seconds. Recommendations shall follow predefined safety and risk rules.

Unnamed: 3: As a user, I want a dashboard so that I can view all financial insights in one place.
Unnamed: 6:
1. Financial score, charts, and alerts are displayed in one view.
	2. Dashboard navigation works smoothly.
Unnamed: 7: Design and implement a centralized dashboard displaying financial score, analysis charts, alerts, and recommendations in a single interface.
Unnamed: 8: Dashboard pages shall load within 3 seconds. Navigation between dashboard sections shall be smooth and responsive.

Unnamed: 3: As a user, I want access to finance news so that I stay financially aware.
Unnamed: 6:
1. Finance news loads successfully.
	2. News content is displayed correctly.
Unnamed: 7: Integrate a finance news API to fetch and display relevant financial news articles within the application.
Unnamed: 8: News content shall be fetched and displayed within 3 seconds. The system shall handle API failures gracefully.

Unnamed: 3: As a developer, I want the system tested so that it is reliable and stable.
Unnamed: 6:
1. Core system features are tested successfully.
	2. Identified bugs are documented and resolved.
Unnamed: 7: Perform unit testing and integration testing to validate functionality and ensure system stability before deployment.
Unnamed: 8: System shall maintain stability during testing. Critical defects shall be resolved within 48 hours.

Unnamed: 3: As a user, I want an interactive finance game so that I can learn financial concepts engagingly.
Unnamed: 6:
1. Game launches and runs without errors.
	2. Financial concepts are clearly demonstrated through gameplay.
Unnamed: 7: Develop a simple rule-based interactive finance learning game to demonstrate financial concepts in an engaging manner.
Unnamed: 8: Game shall load within 3 seconds. Gameplay shall run smoothly without crashes or performance issues.
